short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Audio Alerts on open vaccination slots and rearrange the vaccine centres on the basis of their open slots.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update 1.2 -- 
• Added Automatic Mode: Slots Checked Every 30 Seconds
• Button to "Instructions" added.
• Step by step guide after installation added.

Update 1.1 -- 
• Manual Mode: Get control of when you want to run the finder.
• Buttons to CoWin Website added.
• Rate our app 5 Stars and add your story of vaccination in reviews

"Every time you tried to book a slot and missed out because all of them were booked already" has been a problem all of us have dealt with for a long time now.
With this app, you can not only set alerts on your desktop for any open slots for your princode or district but as well use that cue to quickly get on the booking portal and sort the centres with highest open slots available in just one click.

How to use the extension:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1ExKcYKNJyl6z60exFg1WUgjDdyAf1ggEWJNdF5CxD8o/edit?usp=sharing

1. Select Pincode/ District, Age and Dose
2. Click on submit. (every time you make a new change)
3. Relax till the alert buzz you up.
4. Found a slot? Quickly head to https://selfregistration.cowin.gov.in/.
5. Sign in using your OTP in the CoWin site.
6. Select beneficiary and head to appointment booking page
7. REFRESH PAGE to view the Green Sort Button
8. Input Pincode/District & Search. 
9. 𝗦𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗲𝘀 on the basis of open slots available.
10. Book an appointment quickly,

No need to extensively search for just one open slot among dozens of vaccination centres.
No mindless scrolling and no need to get a lot of anxiety just to book a vaccination slot.
This country has dealt with huge losses. It is lime to use all resources possible to curb the losses.
